CustomField.description: When checked, the payment activity (if charged successfully) will create a new Payment Schedule, copying all Payment Activity Lines over to the detail of the new Payment Schedule. Default unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the payment activity (if charged successfully) will create a new Payment Schedule, copying all Payment Activity Lines over to the detail of the new Payment Schedule. Default unchecked.
CustomField.label: Create Payment Schedule
